title: What is ISO certification and ISO accreditation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Certification body provides certification to your organization management system,(like for quality ISO 9001:2015 for environment ISO 14001:2015 ) but how would you know the certification bodies are competent to provide the certification. So every country has there own accreditation bodies to qualify these certification bodies to provide the certification. E.g.- India- NABCB- National accreditation board for certification bodies. UK - United Kingdom Accreditation Service. They provide the accreditation to these certification bodies by after evaluation. And after qualification certification bodies can provide certification to your organization management system. List of Certification Bodies -QMS When you get the certification for your organization management system. you get the name of certification body & logo of accreditation body.  Hope you understand.

There are many ISO Certificates having different standards such as ISO 9001-2015 is for Quality Management System, ISO 14001 for Environment Management System and ISO 27001 is issued for Information Security Management System etc. These Standards are called “Certification” The ISO Certificates are issued by the Accreditation Body such as UKAS (United Kingdom Accreditation Services) and TUV SUD accredited by NABCB. For example, if you obtain a degree certificate, the accreditation body to issue the certificate is “University” of your home country. The process is called “Accreditation”.
